entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
